subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|らい|yomi=on}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=らい}} {{m|ltc|來|tr=*ləi}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} {{zh-m|來}}.

subSections.title: Prefix
Suffix
Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|く|yomi=kun}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=く}}. The verb ''ku'' is one of the few [[monosyllabic]] verb roots in Japanese. This developed into [[来る|''kuru'']] in modern Japanese.

subSections.title: Verb
